com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.buttons

Interface ButtonControllerRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultControllerRegistry

    public interface ButtonControllerRegistry
    Defines the interface for managing a collection of controllers for media control buttons which use an icon fontset to present the button operation via a glyph defined by the font.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.widget.Button getButton(int id)
      Implements a getter to obtain a button widget for the button controller with a given button id.
      int getId(android.widget.Button button)
      Implements a mapping from button widget to button identifier to obtain the Android resource identifier corresponding to a given button widget.
      int getManagedState(int id)
      Obtain the managed state information from the controller with a given Android resource id.
      java.util.List<ButtonState> getStateList(int id)
      Implements a getter for the state list associated with a given button.
      void register(ButtonController controller)
      Implements to register a given button controller.

    • Method Detail

      • getManagedState

        int getManagedState(int id)
        Obtain the managed state information from the controller with a given Android resource id.
        Returns:
        -1 if no matching controller is found, the non-negative value otherwise.

      • getButton

        android.widget.Button getButton(int id)
        Implements a getter to obtain a button widget for the button controller with a given button id.
        Parameters:
        id - The Android button resource identifier.
        Returns:
        null if no such button exists in the registry, the Button object otherwise.

      • register

        void register(ButtonController controller)
        Implements to register a given button controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - The given button controller.

      • getId

        int getId(android.widget.Button button)
        Implements a mapping from button widget to button identifier to obtain the Android resource identifier corresponding to a given button widget.
        Parameters:
        button - The given button.
        Returns:
        -1 if there is no such button in the registry, the associated Button otherwise.

      • getStateList

        java.util.List<ButtonState> getStateList(int id)
        Implements a getter for the state list associated with a given button.
        Parameters:
        id - The given button.
        Returns:
        an empty list if no button state has been defined for the given button, a non-empty list otherwise.
